entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening and ending after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
